reviewText:
They are all made with the high standard the masters people want.
Some have more "special featutes" than the others.

In the case of the 2009 edition, it has press conferences, the green jacket ceremony, par 3 contest and the "feature" with jin nantz leading the comentaries.
The only reason i don`t give them the "5 stars" is that the feature should last longer.
Then again, this is a product to be recomended.
